title: "GDS harnesses machine learning to control feedback spam"
excerpt: "Felix Reilly, a data scientist at GDS, said in a blogpost that GOV.UK received around 540,000 feedback responses in 2021, and that in early 2022 there was a surge in spam to a peak of 12% of the total."
